channel.title: Softlayer_billing_invoice_tax_status on SoftLayer API
channel.description: Recent content in Softlayer_billing_invoice_tax_status on SoftLayer API

item.title: SoftLayer_Billing_Invoice_Tax_Status
item.description: SoftLayer_Billing_Invoice_Tax_Status Service Datatype Description Invoice tax status allows the SoftLayer system to track the status of an invoice if the related tax is being calculated by a third-party service. This allows us to know when tax has been calculated and applied successfully and when it has not. seeAlso SoftLayer_Billing_Invoice SoftLayer_Billing_Invoice_Tax_Type Methods getAllObjects getObject Retrieve a SoftLayer_Billing_Invoice_Tax_Status record.

item.title: SoftLayer_Billing_Invoice_Tax_Status
item.description: SoftLayer_Billing_Invoice_Tax_Status Service Datatype Description The invoice tax status data type models a single status or state that an invoice can reflect in regard to an integration with a third-party tax calculation service. Local createDate Type: dateTime id Type: integer keyName Type: string modifyDate Type: dateTime name Type: string
